TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause

Docs.summary: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies a security tokens using the distinguished name of the certificate issuer and the X.509 certificate's serial number.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Typically, the X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause is not used, other than when a custom security token service is created. When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security. Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message. These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token. Use the X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause class to reference a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token using the distinguished name of the certificate issuer and the X.509 certificate's serial number. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerSerialNumber%2A> properties represent the distinguished name of the certificate issuer and the X.509 certificate's serial number, respectively.
[!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] supports the following types of security token references for <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security tokens.
- X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause
- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>
- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate) cil managed

Docs.param: An that contains the X.509 certificate.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerSerialNumber%2A> to the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> property and the issuer serial number returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> method, respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string issuerName, string issuerSerialNumber) cil managed

Docs.param: The distinguished name of the certificate authority that issued the X.509 certificate. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerName%2A> property.
The serial number of the X.509 certificate. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerSerialNumber%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified distinguished name of the certificate issuer and the serial number of the X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `issuerSerialNumber` parameter must be in signed large integer format.

Docs.summary: Gets the distinguished name of the certificate authority that issued the X.509 certificate.
Docs.value: The distinguished name of the certificate authority that issued the X.509 certificate.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The IssuerName property contains the name of the certificate authority (CA) that issued the certificate.
The distinguished name for the certificate is a textual representation of the certificate subject or issuer. This representation consists of X.500 name attributes (for example, "CN=MyName, OU=MyOrgUnit, C=US").

Docs.summary: Gets the serial number of the X.509 certificate.
Docs.value: The serial number of the X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The issuer serial number is in signed large integer format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Matches(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause) cil managed

Docs.param: A to compare to this instance.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance matches the specified key identifier.
Docs.returns: if is a type and the key identifier clauses match; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause> class, the values of the key identifier clauses that are compared to determine if there is a match are the values of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerSerialNumber%2A> properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Matches(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate) cil managed

Docs.param: An that contains the X.509 certificate to compare.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance matches the specified X.509 certificate.
Docs.returns: if has the same issuer name and issuer serial number as the current instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The issuer name and issuer serial number are obtained from the `certificate` parameter, by getting the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> property and calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> method, respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Matches (string issuerName, string issuerSerialNumber);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Matches(string issuerName, string issuerSerialNumber) cil managed

Docs.param: The distinguished name of the certificate authority that issued the X.509 certificate.
The serial number of the X.509 certificate.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified issuer name and issuer serial number.
Docs.returns: if the and parameters match the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerSerialNumber%2A> properties; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.Matches%2A> method returns the values of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerName%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause.IssuerSerialNumber%2A> properties.
